杘杘杘

杘字的基本解释

杘
chì
络丝车的摇把。
泛指器物的把：“以金剑为难，长五尺，为銎，木杘。”

杘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》丑利切，去至，徹。］
(1)器物的柄。
(2)见“嚜杘”。

杘字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　杘； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页512第04
【唐韻】丑利切【集韻】丑二切，?音呬。篗柄也，收絲具。　又【韻會】女履切，尼上聲。又【集韻】女利切，音膩。義?同。　又【方言】小兒多詐而獪謂之嚜杘。【列子·力命篇】墨杘、單至、嘽咺、?懯四人相與遊於世。【韻會】墨杘，人名。寓言也。【皮日休·反招魂】上暖昧而下墨杘。　又【集韻】抽遲切，音絺。義同。

杘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
杘字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhan
Basic explanation of words
Zhan
chì
The handle of the winding car.
It refers to the handle of a utensil in general: "It is difficult to use a golden sword, it is five feet long, it is xiong, Muzhe."
Zhan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guangyun" is ugly and sharp, going to the end, thorough. ]
(1) The handle of the utensil.
(2) See "嚜杘".
Zhan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　杘; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 512 04
[Tang Yun] Ugly Liqie [Ji Yun] Ugly two cuts, sound? The shank is also a wire-retracting tool.　[Rhyme Club] The women’s shoes are cut, and the voice is on. Also 【Jiyun】female Liqie, greasy voice. Righteous? Same.　[Dialect] Children are deceitful and slanderous. 【Liezi·Liming Chapter】Mo Zan, Shanzhi, Laihao, and 啴懯 are four people and you are in the world. [Rhyme Club] Mo Zhu, the name of a person. Fables too. 【Pi Rixiu·Anti-calling】Going to the warm ambiguity and going down to Mo Zan.　[Jiyun] Pumping late and cutting, sound 絺. The same meaning.
Zhan
